v.v: Everyone should praise Yahweh now and forever!
People who live in the east and people who live in the west,
Yahweh rules over all the nations,
There is no one who is like Yahweh, our God,
and looks far down through the heavens and sees the people on the earth.
He lifts poor people up so that they no longer sit in the dirt;
and causes them to be honored by sitting next to leaders,
He also enables women who have no children to live in their houses

v: You people who serve Yahweh, praise him!
and high in the heavens he shows that his glory is very great.
who lives in the highest heaven
he lifts needy people up so that they no longer sit on heaps of ashes
leaders who rule his own people.
as happy as mothers with children.
